name: im a bread boy :)
description:
escape the toaster factory as a physically simulated slice of bread in this mini-metroidvania puzzle platformer. it is too difficult and i apologise

controls
  • WAD - jump
  • ESC - pause
  • R - restart to last checkpoint
  • WASD - swim
    • credit

    everything was made by myself in  ~10 days for GWJ 51! i didnt have quite as much time as i wanted so some parts are a bit buggy

    tools used

    Aseprite | VSCode | Audacity | Mixcraft 9 | Godot
